items.badge_description: After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 120 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 25!

beer.beer_description: Amber Bohemian Lager fermented with low attenuating Czech Lager yeast, which gives this beer a rich and comforting malt aroma and flavour.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 90 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 19!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 75 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 16!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 30 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 7! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 155 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 32.

beer.beer_description: Amber Bohemian Lager fermented with low attenuating Czech Lager yeast, which gives this beer a rich and comforting malt aroma and flavour.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 225 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 46!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 25 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 6!

items.checkin_comment: Different batch, better taste. Incredible biscuit tones.

items.badge_description: We love lagers! Crisp, clean, cold fermenting, these beers are a labor of love. Whether a dark Dunkel, a malty amber, or a light helles, lagers never fail us. So on Lager Day, join us in a toast to the humble lager.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
